#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i, m;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		string str;
		char s[ 4 ];
		bzero( s, sizeof( s ) );
		
		cin >> str;
		n = str.length();
		
		for( i = 0;i < n; ) {
			
			if( ( str[ i ] == '6' ) || ( str[ i ] == '7' ) || ( str[ i ] == '8' ) || ( str[ i ] == '9' ) || ( str[ i ] == '3' ) ) {
			
				s[ 0 ] = str[ i ]; 
				s[ 1 ] = str[ i + 1 ]; 
				s[ 2 ] = '\0';
				i += 2;
			}
			else { 
			
				s[ 0 ] = str[ i ]; 
				s[ 1 ] = str[ i + 1 ]; 
				s[ 2 ] = str[ i + 2 ]; 
				s[ 3 ] = '\0';
				i += 3;
			}
			
			m = atoi( s );		
			cout << ( char )m;
			bzero( s, sizeof( s ) );
		}
		
		cout << endl;
		str.clear();
	}
	return 0;
}
